class.name: VisualShaderNodeGroupBase
class.brief_description: Base class for a family of nodes with variable amount of input and output ports within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Currently, has no direct usage, use the derived classes instead.

method.name: add_input_port
method.description: Adds an input port with the specified [code]type[/code] (see [enum VisualShaderNode.PortType]) and [code]name[/code].

method.name: add_output_port
method.description: Adds an output port with the specified [code]type[/code] (see [enum VisualShaderNode.PortType]) and [code]name[/code].

method.name: clear_input_ports
method.description: Removes all previously specified input ports.

method.name: clear_output_ports
method.description: Removes all previously specified output ports.

method.name: get_free_input_port_id
method.description: Returns a free input port ID which can be used in [method add_input_port].

method.name: get_free_output_port_id
method.description: Returns a free output port ID which can be used in [method add_output_port].

method.name: get_input_port_count
method.description: Returns the number of input ports in use. Alternative for [method get_free_input_port_id].

method.name: get_inputs
method.description: Returns a [String] description of the input ports as as colon-separated list using the format [code]id,type,name;[/code] (see [method add_input_port]).

method.name: get_output_port_count
method.description: Returns the number of output ports in use. Alternative for [method get_free_output_port_id].

method.name: get_outputs
method.description: Returns a [String] description of the output ports as as colon-separated list using the format [code]id,type,name;[/code] (see [method add_output_port]).

method.name: has_input_port
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified input port exists.

method.name: has_output_port
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified output port exists.

method.name: is_valid_port_name
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified port name does not override an existed port name and is valid within the shader.

method.name: remove_input_port
method.description: Removes the specified input port.

method.name: remove_output_port
method.description: Removes the specified output port.

method.name: set_input_port_name
method.description: Renames the specified input port.

method.name: set_input_port_type
method.description: Sets the specified input port's type (see [enum VisualShaderNode.PortType]).

method.name: set_inputs
method.description: Defines all input ports using a [String] formatted as a colon-separated list: [code]id,type,name;[/code] (see [method add_input_port]).

method.name: set_output_port_name
method.description: Renames the specified output port.

method.name: set_output_port_type
method.description: Sets the specified output port's type (see [enum VisualShaderNode.PortType]).

method.name: set_outputs
method.description: Defines all output ports using a [String] formatted as a colon-separated list: [code]id,type,name;[/code] (see [method add_output_port]).
